description: '''Cumbia pop''', also known as '''Cumbia cheta{{efn-ua|Translated from [[Rioplatense Spanish]] into English as "Fancy Cumbia" or "Posh cumbia".}}''', is a musical subgenre that fuses [[cumbia]] with elements of [[Pop music|pop]] and [[Latin pop]]. Originated in the 2000s in the [[RÃ­o de la Plata]] region (which encompasses [[Uruguay]] and [[Argentina]]), it went mainstream in the 2010s, with the formation of several bands that gained widespread popularity.
